summary: This document contains an email exchange between Lesley Groff and Paul Morris regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein. It highlights the professional relationship between Morris and Epstein, as well as the involvement of Deutsche Bank in the context of Epstein's financial dealings.
